name: getLastCredential
saveCurentCredentialToGlobal
func:
const data = msg.payload[0];

let process_env = {
    "_id": data._id,
    "botName": data.botName ? data.botName.trim() : '',
    "botToken": data.botToken ? data.botToken.trim() : '',
    "openAIKey": data.openAIKey ? data.openAIKey.trim() : '',
    "chatVersion": data.chatVersion ? data.chatVersion.trim() : '',
    "elevenlabsKey": data.elevenlabsKey ? data.elevenlabsKey.trim() : '',
    "elevenlabsVoice": data.elevenlabsVoice ? data.elevenlabsVoice.trim() : '',
    "d_idKey": data.d_idKey ? data.d_idKey.trim() : '',
    "d_idAvatar": data.d_idAvatar ? data.d_idAvatar.trim() : '',
    "prompt": data.prompt ? data.prompt.trim() : '',
    "greetings": data.greetings ? data.greetings.trim() : '',
    "error": data.error ? data.error.trim() : "Sorry, something went wrong üòû"
}

global.set("botCredential", process_env);

return msg;
